Entries.ClaireMovie: Clayton looked good... Do you think I can ask for an autograph?$0
'The Thief of Justice' had an astonishing story. I was captivated the entire time!$3#$e#Clayton looked breathtaking in his costume.$1
Maybe I should let Clayton lead aerobics class next week. He can teach us choreography from the movie!$0#$e#I imagine it'd be a good workout!$1
Clayton was amazing! Go Clayton! Woo!$1
Hey there. What did you think of the movie, @? Didn't Clayton do a great job?$0#$e#I really hope he gets more film opportunities in the future. I know how much it means to him.#

Entries.fall_Tue2: My mom always says 'manners are key'. I try my best to be polite to everyone.$0#$e#Maybe that's why I got the job at Joja Mart.$0
Entries.summer_Tue2: Clayton mentioned the air conditioning in the store is too much for him.$2#$e#My manager won't turn it down, though. He says it attracts customers.$3

Entries.Mon6: I don't know why, but I'm feeling great today.$1#$e#It's probably the breakfast my mom made me!$1
Entries.Wed: Hello.$0#$e#Err. Do you need assistance with anything, sir?^Err. Do you need assistance with anything, ma'am?
Entries.Thu8: How's Clayton doing?$0#$e#I'm glad you two are living a happy life together.$0

Entries.BusStop_12_8: %Bus Driver:   Either get on the bus or step off sir.^%Bus Driver:  Either get on the bus or step off ma'am.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'm gonna tell my mom and dad about this place!$1
Entries.Tue2: My mom packed me a big lunch today.$0#$e#She packed 'cheez curls', my favorite chips!$1
Entries.Sat6: Hey @! How are you!?$1#$e#I'm pepped up on the coffee my mom brewed this morning!$1#$e#Have a fantastic day!$1
Entries.summer_Sat8: My mom packed me a couple tacos. I don't mind sharing![213]$0#$e#Her cooking is the best.$1
Entries.winter_Sat4: My mom is knitting a scarf for me.$0#$e#I hope it isn't too big this time...$4
Entries.married_Claire: I'm happy for you and Clayton.$0#$b#Just... take care of him, alright? And treat him well. He's my best friend.$6
Entries.divorced_Claire: I'm sorry things didn't work out between you and Clayton..$2
Entries.Sat2: Hey. What do you think about Clayton, my co-worker?$0#$e#He's really cool.$6
Entries.winter_Tue8: Sometimes I catch Clayton humming a pleasant tune to himself...$6#$e#Oh. Err. Can I help you with anything @?$0

Entries.Martin_TheaterMessage_Rain: Ever since you and Clayton got married, I've been working more at the theater.$0#$b#I might get promoted soon if I keep it up!$1
